price: He is the Vanquisher over His slaves, and He is the All-Wise, the All-Aware.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَاهِرُ فَوۡقَ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
